name: Erik no densetsu
description:
A dungeon-crawler with fight inspired by Undertale!

Demonia, the queen of Darkness launches an attack on the Moonstone village and kidnapped your sister.

You are Erik, a young farmer, and the last survivor.

 Chara design by Kahoo Okashii:

Erik no densetsu is a Dungeon crawler with undertale-like fighting!

 Warning: Erik no densetsu is more like a dungeon crawler than a visual novel even though he looks like a lot.

Various paths and various ennemies, try to find the best way to reach the final boss!
